title: RHOSLC: Meredith Marks, Ace Attorney
description:
On part two of the Real Housewives of Salt Lake City season 2 reunion, the rift between Lisa and Meredith seems to grow irreparably wider, especially after Meredith dons her lawyer hat and dismantles Lisa's claims.

Get tix to our live shows: https://www.watchwhatcrappens.com/10th-anniversary-hunky-dory-tour/
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
